character.name: Ace card
character.effect: Can count as an 11 or a 1 in all stats

scenery.name: Casino
scenery.effect: cards with 'card' on its name have a boost

Props.name: Handfull of tokens
Props.effect: 'You had luck at the machines!' draw a new Prop, and if it has 'card' on it's card text, draw another one

Events.name: Blackjack!
Events.effect: draw one character, if it has 'card' on it's name or card text, draw another one. If the cards you drew have each 'Ace' and 'Figure' as their names, you can play them.
